com.here.android.mpa.electronic_horizon

Interface ElectronicHorizon.Listener

  • Enclosing class:
    ElectronicHorizon

    public static interface ElectronicHorizon.Listener
    Represents an interface for responding to electronic horizon events sent by the ElectronicHorizon.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onChildDetached(PathTree parent, PathTree child)
      Called every time a path is detached from its parent.
      void onLinkAdded(PathTree path, Link link)
      Called every time a new link is added to the tree.
      void onLinkRemoved(PathTree path, Link link)
      Called when a link is removed from the tree.
      void onNewPosition(Position position)
      Guaranteed to be called after updating electronic horizon when a valid map matched position is available.
      void onPathAdded(PathTree path)
      Called every time a new path is added to the tree.
      void onPathRemoved(PathTree path)
      Called every time a path is removed from the tree.
      void onTreeReset()
      Called every time when the tree is reset.

    • Method Detail

      • onNewPosition

        void onNewPosition(Position position)
        Guaranteed to be called after updating electronic horizon when a valid map matched position is available.
        Parameters:
        position - Updated position which contains the most probable path which we are currently on and the offset from its origin or an offroad position otherwise.

      • onTreeReset

        void onTreeReset()
        Called every time when the tree is reset.

        Note: A tree reset occurs when the new position cannot be matched to the expected main path or one of it's side paths. The tree will be rebuilt based on the new position.

      • onLinkAdded

        void onLinkAdded(PathTree path,
                 Link link)
        Called every time a new link is added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to which the link was added.
        link - The link which was added.

      • onLinkRemoved

        void onLinkRemoved(PathTree path,
                   Link link)
        Called when a link is removed from the tree.

        Note: This is not called when the link was already removed as a result of ElectronicHorizon.Listener.onPathRemoved(PathTree).

        Parameters:
        path - The path from which the link will be removed.
        link - The link which will be removed.

      • onPathAdded

        void onPathAdded(PathTree path)
        Called every time a new path is added to the tree.
        Parameters:
        path - The path which was added.

      • onPathRemoved

        void onPathRemoved(PathTree path)
        Called every time a path is removed from the tree.
        Parameters:
        path - The path which will be removed.

        Note: No additional events about removing will be sent for children and links of this path.

      • onChildDetached

        void onChildDetached(PathTree parent,
                     PathTree child)
        Called every time a path is detached from its parent.

        Note: The detached child is expected to become the new main path, as the vehicle's position could still be matched on the tree.

        Parameters:
        parent - The parent path tree.
        child - The child path tree.
